mapper.sql: i.id, i.interviewAddress, i.instructions, i.interTime, i.positionID, i.createTime, i.updateTime, i.version, i.isDeleted, i.createBy, i.updateBy,i.isCultivate

i.id , i.interviewAddress, i.instructions, i.interTime, i.version, i.isDeleted,i.isCultivate, addr.longitude as 'addr.longitude' ,addr.id as 'addr.id',addr.detailedAddress as 'addr.detailedAddress',addr.latitude as 'addr.latitude', addr.id as 'addr.city.id',city.cityName as 'addr.city.cityName',city.zipCode as 'addr.city.zipCode',city.pinyin as 'addr.city.pinyin',city.openState as 'addr.city.openState',city.isHot as 'addr.city.isHot'

where 1=1 and i.id = #{isCultivateisCultivate.id} and i.interviewAddress = #{condition.interviewAddress} and i.instructions = #{condition.instructions} and i.interTime = #{condition.interTime} and i.positionID = #{condition.positionID} and i.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and i.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and i.version = #{condition.version} and i.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} and i.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and i.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy} and i.isCultivate=#{condition.isCultivate}

where 1=1 and i.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(i.interviewAddress) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.interviewAddress}),'%')) and UPPER(i.instructions) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.instructions}),'%')) and UPPER(i.interTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.interTime}),'%')) and UPPER(i.positionID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.positionID}),'%')) and UPPER(i.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(i.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(i.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(i.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%')) and UPPER(i.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(i.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%')) and UPPER(i.isCultivate) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isCultivate}),'%'))
mapper.update: update interview set interviewAddress=#{interviewAddress}, instructions=#{instructions}, interTime=#{interTime}, positionID=#{positionID}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, createBy=#{createBy}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, isCultivate=#{isCultivate} where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from interview i left join localtioninfo addr on i.interviewAddress = addr.id left join city city on city.id = addr.cityID where i.id = #{id} and i.isDeleted = false
select from interview i left join localtioninfo addr on i.interviewAddress = addr.id left join city city on city.id = addr.cityID ${orderByClause}
select from interview i left join localtioninfo addr on i.interviewAddress = addr.id left join city city on city.id = addr.cityID ${orderByClause}
select from interview i left join localtioninfo addr on i.interviewAddress = addr.id left join city city on city.id = addr.cityID ${orderByClause}
select from interview i left join localtioninfo addr on i.interviewAddress = addr.id left join city city on city.id = addr.cityID ${orderByClause}
select from interview i left join localtioninfo addr on i.interviewAddress = addr.id left join city city on city.id = addr.cityID ${orderByClause} limit 0,1
